entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:01 AM MDT Friday 14 April 2023
